message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm looking for $180 for it. Would you be interested in making a deal?
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I'm interested, but I can only pay up to $120 for it.
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I can do $150, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. Is $150 a price you'd be willing to pay?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it, but I can only pay up to $130 for the product.
I can see you're really trying to negotiate, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can do $140, but that's as low as I can go. Is that something you'd consider?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I can agree to $135 for the product.

I think we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $135, but I need a bit more to make it worth my while. I can do $145, but that's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.
I understand your position, Alice. I am willing to pay $140 for the product.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $145. I'm starting to think I should consider other options. I'll stick to my previous offer of $145. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to explore other opportunities.
Considering our previous negotiations, I am willing to pay $140 for the product.
